channel.title: Web client
channel.description:
Guys,
I want to create my own web client for my server. I've changed the picture, and I've looked at a web client tutorial. When I ran my client, a part of my picture was flipped over. I do not know how to fix this. Please post your answer. It would be a grateful pleasure.
Cheers,
GunzTheDuel [img]http://i179.photobucket.com/albums/w291/flyffhelp/CopyofGunzTheDuel.jpg[/img] [size=7pt]http://www.gunzonline.com/[/size] [size=7pt]http://gunz.ijji.com/[/size]

item.title: Web client
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Do you mean horizontally? I’ve flipped it horizontally but nothing has changed when I compiled and ran my web client source.

Read full topic

item.title: Web client
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

lol i had the same prob, its the case with all of them, when you are editting your picture simply select the righ hand side of the background picture and flip it vertically, then run, make take some trial and error to get in the correct possition.

Read full topic
